name: European Respiratory Society
goal:
ERS

ERS is the leading professional,medical organisation in its field in Europe. It is broad-based, with members in over 180 countries. Its scope covers both basic science and clinical medicine.

ERS mission

ERS seeks to alleviate suffering from respiratory disease and promote lung health.
interests: Climate Action, Education and training, Environment, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market
euInitiatives: Internal Market, Environment, Health and Research legislation such as the framework research programmes
